summary: The document is a classified memorandum from 23 August 1976, detailing Frank Sturgis's activities, including his upcoming appearance on the Tomorrow Show, his acquisition of cryptographic material related to Albania from Marita Lorenz in New York, and his efforts to contact Senator Baker to transfer this material. The DCD Miami office was tasked with monitoring the situation to ascertain if the material would indeed be passed to Baker. Additionally, the memorandum outlines specific document handling procedures and cites exemptions under the FOIA and other legal provisions.
key_findings: Frank Sturgis was scheduled to appear on the Tomorrow Show on 24 August 1976.
Sturgis acquired cryptographic material from Marita Lorenz, which appeared to be related to Albania.
Sturgis made attempts to contact Senator Baker to hand over the cryptographic material.
The DCD Miami office was observing the situation to determine if the material would be transferred to Senator Baker.
The document specifies procedures for handling classified documents and mentions exemptions under the FOIA and other statutes.
